Plot: Based on a true story, a group of boys from Monterrey, Mexico who become the first non-U.S. team to win the Little League World Series.
Title: The Perfect Game
Writer: W. William Winokur, W. William Winokur (book)
Actors: Jake T. Austin, Jansen Panettiere, Moises Arias, Ryan Ochoa
tomatoConsensus: It's bogged down with an unfocused script and countless sports movie cliches, but The Perfect Game still manages to charm with its unabashed sweetness and a stirring final act.
